name: Slopetron
description:
WHAT IS IT?

SLOPETRON is a thrilling cyberpunk arcade bike racing game, with simplistic controls and gameplay that can be played over and over to master the procedurally generated levels! Super easy to pick up and learn, but difficult to master

CREDITS

Developer - @JeppsonDev

Musician - @ASoberAnarchist

VFX Artist - @Willqvist 

CONTROLS:

A - Steer left

D - Steer right

S - Brake

WANT TO SEE MORE FROM US?:

If you're interested to get updates for future Wojon projects, feel free to subscribe to our mailing list: https://wojon.net/mailing

HELP! The audio stutters!

itch.io doesn't support a SharedArrayBuffer which is required to remove audio stuttering. If you want to play without audio glitches/stuttering visit this page: https://gotm.io/jeppson/slopetron
